p: Although there is considerable seasonal and interdecadal variation in temperature ( Fig 1A), our analyses indicate an increase of c. 0.9°C from the peak in 1975 to the peak in 2017 ( Fig 1B). This increase is not even across the year, being greatest in November when temperatures are already highest. During this month, mean daily temperatures increased by c. 2°C between 1975 and 2017 ( Fig 2). In addition, the number of consecutive years in which the hottest mean monthly temperature was above 30°C has increased since 1990 ( Fig 1A).
